channel.title: How do I change the background on the login screen?
channel.description:
I got a source but I want to change the background of the login screen.
I want to put my background there.

item.title: How do I change the background on the login screen?
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

Unpack the sprite pack (usually found as sprites.rscd or sprites.dq), search for sprite 3150(not sure exactly which). Open a new image in your graphics program, save the image, open the sprite editor, save it in the sprite format (.spr), place the new sprite (e.x 3150.spr) in the sprites folder. Run the packer (once itâ€™s run it should output replacing the old sprite) on sprites.rscd/dq, then move it back and it should work.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the background on the login screen?
